Summary: Two flying objects playing maneuver games
divs: Sighting DetailsI have easy access to my roof with a very good view of the sky.I often go up on my roof when they launch the space shuttle or launch rockets from cape Canaveral.I have direct line of sight for the launches.I am about 68 miles north east of the cape.On the night of August 2Nd 2008 at 10:15 p.m. I was on my roof top and saw two objects the size of satellites that you see traveling along the night sky.They where traveling at the same rate of speed and then one would lunge forward at an incredible rate of speed.Then as soon as the object did this maneuver the one that was left behind almost immediately was directly behind the one that zipped forward.The two objects did this for around two minutes and thirty seconds.Back and forth one would do the move and then the other would go first.I have never seen anything in my life as I saw that evening.I will never forget those moments in time.I watched them do this as they where headed directly north ward until they went out of sight.
